name: Beetle Junior DS
summary: You embody the little beetle Junior on an adventure to defend his burrow which is threatened by sinister adversaries that invaded his territory. Use all your cunning to outsmart ,,Junior's'' enemies and to survive falling boulders and explosives. More than 70 nicely-crafted levels offer tons of action and will challenge your skills and tactics to the limit. Come help little Junior to face of these dangers!
